mdRecord.dcterms:title: The law of evidence / by Lord Chief Baron Gilbert. Considerably enlarged by Capel Lofft. To which is prefixed some account of the author and his argument in a case of homicide in Ireland
Dwyer's case
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gilbert, Geoffrey, 1674-1726 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Argument on the distinction between manslaughter and murther, deduced by an investigation of our ancient law: being the introductory part of an opinion delivered by Jeffray Gilbert, esq. then one of the judges of the Court of King's Bench in Ireland. In Dwyer's case; on a special verdict": v. 1, 4, [17] p. following p. xxiv. [original]
